parts.text: {"word":"non-surgical","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"手術を伴わない、非外科的な","english_definition":"not involving surgery","examples":[{"sentence":"She opted for a non-surgical treatment for her back pain.","translation":"彼女は腰痛に対して手術を伴わない治療法を選んだ。"},{"sentence":"There are many non-surgical options available for cosmetic enhancements.","translation":"美容整形には、手術を伴わない選択肢が数多く存在する。"},{"sentence":"The doctor recommended a non-surgical approach to manage the condition.","translation":"医師はその症状を管理するために、手術を伴わない方法を勧めた。"}],"collocations":["non-surgical treatment","non-surgical procedure","non-surgical option","non-surgical approach","non-surgical method","non-surgical intervention"],"synonyms":["conservative","non-invasive","medical","therapeutic"],"antonyms":["surgical","invasive"],"related_words":["surgery","surgeon","surgical"],"usage_notes":{"explanation":"The term \"non-surgical\" is used to describe medical treatments or procedures that do not involve cutting into the body or removing tissue. It is often used in contrast to \"surgical\" treatments, which do involve these interventions. Non-surgical options are often preferred when possible, as they typically involve less risk and a shorter recovery time.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ She had a non surgery treatment.","correct":"✓ She had a non-surgical treatment.","note":"The correct adjective form is 'non-surgical', not 'non surgery'."},{"incorrect":"✗ The non surgical is better than the surgical.","correct":"✓ Non-surgical treatment is better than surgical treatment. / ✓ Non-surgical options are better than surgical options.","note":"'Non-surgical' is an adjective and needs to modify a noun. You can't say 'the non-surgical' by itself."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"Relatively low frequency, but common in medical contexts.","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"The word \"non-surgical\" is used in medical contexts to describe treatments or procedures that do not involve surgery. It is formed by adding the prefix \"non-\" to the word \"surgical,\" indicating the absence of surgery. This term is commonly used when discussing treatment options for various medical conditions, especially when comparing surgical and non-surgical approaches. Understanding this term is important for comprehending medical information and discussions about healthcare options."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The clinic specializes in non-surgical cosmetic procedures.","translation":"そのクリニックは、手術を伴わない美容整形施術を専門としている。","type":"general","meaning_category":"General"},{"sentence":"Physical therapy is often a non-surgical treatment for sports injuries.","translation":"理学療法は、スポーツによる怪我に対する手術を伴わない治療法であることが多い。","type":"medical","meaning_category":"Medical"},{"sentence":"He explored non-surgical alternatives before deciding on surgery.","translation":"彼は手術を決断する前に、手術を伴わない代替手段を検討した。","type":"decision making","meaning_category":"Options"}]}
